mapper.select: SELECT c.*, p.title AS post_title FROM comment c, post p WHERE c.board_id = p.board_id AND c.post_id = p.post_id AND c.board_id = #{boardId} AND c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.created_date_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(board_id, post_id, comment_id, display_name, password, contents, created_date_time) values( #{boardId}, #{postId}, COALESCE( (SELECT MAX(comment_id)+1 FROM comment where board_id = #{boardId} and post_id =#{postId}),1 ), #{displayName}, #{password}, #{contents}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
